# NSApp

**Global Variable**

The global variable for the shared app instance.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var NSApp: NSApplication!
```

## Discussion

The value in this global variable is the same as accessing the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/shared] property of the app.

## Getting the shared app object

- **shared**: Returns the application instance, creating it if it doesn’t exist yet.
